job_details.degree_required: Associate degree in Information Technology or a related field required; Bachelor’s degree preferred

jd: From: Aditi Sikarwar, Tek Inspirations aditi.sikarwar@tekinspirations.com Reply to: aditi.sikarwar@tekinspirations.com No relocation - candidate must already be in the area. C# .Net DeveloperOn-siteNeed Local candidates and genuine candidates of Prince George, VA This is a Developer role. The perfect candidate is someone who has very strong SQL skills (SQL Server, DBA, T-SQL stored procedures, query optimization) as well as some experience with .NET development. It will be a 6-month contract-to-hire opportunity . The candidate will need to be within a 20–30-minute drive of the Richmond, VA or Prince George, VA areas. There will be on-site requirements for this role in Prince George, VA. I'll go over client details with the candidates directly and the interviews will be on-site in Prince George, VA. Likely 2 rounds. Key Responsibilities:Develop and enhance applications using C#, ASP.Net Core, and Visual Basic.Migrate legacy VB applications to C# and maintain SQL Server databases.Create and optimize T-SQL stored procedures, SQL Agent jobs, and perform light database administration tasks.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support integration with multiple ERP applications.Develop testing plans and conduct thorough testing of code prior to production rollout.Assist with desktop support and IT infrastructure to maintain 24/7 operations.Required Skills:Proficiency in C#, ASP.Net Core, and Visual Basic (including code translation from VB to C#).Strong experience with Microsoft SQL Server, including T-SQL, stored procedures, and query optimization.Familiarity with Microsoft Operating Systems (Windows 7, 10, Server 2008 and above).Experience with Microsoft Azure DEVOPS.Desired Skills:Basic understanding of Cisco Switches, LAN, and Fiber Optics.Knowledge of EPICS, Sage 100, Global Search, and MP2 is a significant plus.Experience in Azure Cloud development and Android development using Java/Kotlin.Education Requirements:Associate degree in Information Technology or a related field required; Bachelor’s degree preferred.Minimum of 2 years of relevant application development experience in a production environment with required skills.Team Environment:Join a dynamic IT team of 6 within a larger organization of 450+ employees.Casual dress code (jeans).Please let me know if you have any questions. Mention all the main skills in the resume at least 4-5 point of each skills and attach the certification and logo as well in the fronty oage of resume if the candiiates have .Thanks & RegAditi SikarwarTechnical RecruiterTEK Inspirations LLC | 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035E: aditi.sikarwar@tekinspirations.com
